basics.name: Le Hoai Nham
basics.label: Devops Engineer
basics.summary: I am a DevOps Engineer. I have passions in Linux and opensource community. I love helping organizations to build great products. I am passionate about learning new things in technology fields. I spend most of my time working with Linux, DevOps tools, and Python language.

work.summary: Misfit is an American consumer electronics company specializing in wearable technology that utilizes sensors and home automation products.
highlights: Manage AWS resoures like EC2, ECS, S3, Route 53, Cloudfront, Kinesis, SQS, etc
Deploy and manage kubernetes on AWS using kops
Migrate API services from ECS to Kubernetes
Manage elasticsearch-logstash-kibana stack
Deploy and manage many services on kubernetes like graylog2, elasticsearch, kafka, prometheus, sentry
Monitor kubernetes and services using prometheus and grafana, get notified via telegram or slack
Build in-house tools to manage, automate and optimize infrastructure using shell script, python and golang
Help developers to roll out projects using DevOps tools: jenkins, bitbucket pipelines, helm

work.summary: Posiba is an information service for the social sector dedicated to helping those working for public good make greater positive impact.
highlights: Manage linux instances on AWS using puppet.
Help developers to roll out projects using devops tools: puppet, jenkins, docker.
Monitor all infrastructure components using zabbix, get notified via telegram.
Collect all system and application logs using fluentd, elasticsearch and kibana.
Build in-house devops tools using shell script and python.

work.summary: FPT Telecom is one of biggest ISPs in Vietnam.
highlights: Build an monitor system devices using icinga2 and cacti.
Manage linux servers with many roles: DNS cluster, mail gateway, monitoring servers.
Use ansible to manage multiple linux servers.
Build squid proxy for local users.
Build, manage and backup VMware ESXi.

work.summary: vHost.vn is one of the fastest growing hosting providers in Vietnam.
highlights: Support customers to install web server, mail server, and troubleshoot hosting problems.
Monitor system status using zabbix.
Collect and analyze system logs using graylog2.
